entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
